question: Which genes affect response to Immune Checkpoint Inhibitor in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Immune Checkpoint Inhibitor')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Immune Checkpoint Inhibitor'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Immune Checkpoint Inhibitor')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Paclitaxel')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Paclitaxel'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Paclitaxel')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'stomach'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Cabozantinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cabozantinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cabozantinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Cisplatin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cisplatin'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cisplatin')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'esophagus' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'squamous' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Gemcitabine'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Gemcitabine')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'bile' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'duct' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,

  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,

WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN

  disease_name,

LIMIT 100

question: Which genes influence response to Metformin for Breast Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Metformin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Metformin'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Metformin')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'and' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'neck' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'squamous' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,

  disease_name,
  pmids

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cetuximab')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'esophagus' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'squamous' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Raltitrexed'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Raltitrexed')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'gastric' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Imatinib')
)

  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,

  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Axitinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lymphoblastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dacomitinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'glioblastoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'neurofibroma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes influence response to Rezatapopt for Malignant Tumor?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Rezatapopt')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,

WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes affect response to Entrectinib in Lipoleiomyoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Entrectinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Entrectinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Entrectinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myofibroma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Trametinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Trametinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('MTOR Kinase Inhibitor AZD8055')
)

  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

question: Which genes affect response to Cisplatin in Oesophageal Adenocarcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Cisplatin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cisplatin'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cisplatin')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'esophagus' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Nirogacestat')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Nirogacestat'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Nirogacestat')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adult' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 't-cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia/lymphoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'renal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What genes are predictive biomarkers for Telmisartan in Ovary Neoplasm?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Telmisartan')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Telmisartan'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Telmisartan')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ovarian'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,

  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,

LIMIT 100

question: What genes are predictive biomarkers for Hyperthermic Intraperitoneal Chemotherapy in Advanced Malignant Mesothelioma Of Peritoneum?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Hyperthermic Intraperitoneal Chemotherapy')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Hyperthermic Intraperitoneal Chemotherapy'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Hyperthermic Intraperitoneal Chemotherapy')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'peritoneal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'mesothelioma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Erlotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Erlotinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'high' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'grade' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'glioma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Erdafitinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Erdafitinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cholangiocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Elacestrant')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Elacestrant'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Elacestrant')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes influence response to Dovitinib for Carcinoma Of Urinary Bladder?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Dovitinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dovitinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dovitinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'bladder' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Bevacizumab')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'stomach'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Alemtuzumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Alemtuzumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Alemtuzumab')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lymphocytic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Imatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Imatinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'desmoid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'tumor'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes affect response to Temozolomide in Astrocytoma Of Cerebrum?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Temozolomide')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Temozolomide'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Temozolomide')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'malignant' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'astrocytoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes influence response to Cetuximab for Oropharyngeal Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Cetuximab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cetuximab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cetuximab')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'oropharynx'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,

  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,

UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Aumolertinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Aumolertinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Aumolertinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FOLFIRI Regimen'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('FOLFIRI Regimen')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colorectal'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Amphotericin B')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Amphotericin B'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Amphotericin B')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ovarian'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Ibrutinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Ibrutinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ibrutinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lymphocytic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes affect response to Crizotinib in Malignant Ear Melanoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Crizotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Crizotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Crizotinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'skin' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What genes are predictive biomarkers for Panitumumab in Colorectal Adenocarcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Panitumumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Panitumumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Panitumumab')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colorectal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List genes with evidence affecting Mocetinostat in Malignant Mesothelioma.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Mocetinostat')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Mocetinostat'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Mocetinostat')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'malignant' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'mesothelioma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List genes with evidence affecting Pexidartinib in Glioblastoma Multiforme.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Pexidartinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Pexidartinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pexidartinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'glioblastoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Larotrectinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'esophageal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Fluorouracil')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Fluorouracil'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Fluorouracil')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'stomach'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Ibuprofen')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Ibuprofen'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ibuprofen')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'head' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'and' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'neck' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'squamous' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Birabresib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'nut' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'midline' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Platinum Compound')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Platinum Compound'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Platinum Compound')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ovarian' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100
